entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot use Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server when using "WebApplication.Urls" #57255
  • OIDC front channel remote sign-out "iss" claim check bypassed by default #57254
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mvc #57250
  • Ihosted service Task hosted in IIS process is not triggering StopAsync while performing IISreset #57248
  • Perf improvement: caching #57245
  • WithHttpLogging configuration is not respected #57244

Closed

  • `[ApiController]` attributes causes exception during serialization of `(Validation)ProblemDetails` when using source-generator-based serialization #57019
  • Can't display object properties #57252
  • Published size improvement: todosapivanilla #57251
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudUpdateProduct #57229
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57227
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57239
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #57240
  • [ARM64][JSPS]Debugging issue: Swagger Page Load Failure #57249
  • Project that uses Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web copies packages.lock.json to output #55568
    9.0-rc1
  • Static SSR sets null to an array property of a model for EditForm when submit. #56890
    9.0-rc1
  • Blazor form bindings does not work when property has non latin characters #56082
    9.0-rc1
  • Antiforgery state doesn't always reach interactive components #54533
    9.0-rc1
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware, plaintext #57226
  • Use DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledExceptionsAttribute for things like Blazor NavigationExcetptions #57085
    9.0-rc1
  • Blazor needs to be more object oriented and event handlers need to be revised. #57024
  • .NET 8 - '_framework/blazor.web.js' requires Authentication for some reason #56970
  • Blazor .net 8 new interactive project structure fails to connect to debug adapter #57077

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix OpenAPI transformer lifetimes and disposal #57253
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Allow cascading value subscribers to get added and removed during change notification #57243
    area-blazor

Merged

  • [Blazor] Fix antiforgery not being available after first render #57237
    area-blazor, 9.0-rc1
  • Use [DebuggerDisableUserUnhandledExceptions] #57148
    area-blazor, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `268817f` #56008
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • Update azure-pipelines-mirror-within-azdo.yml for 8.0 #56456
    area-infrastructure
  • Middleware/Rewrite: Update XML comments for "AddRedirect" to indicate status code. #57224
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-middleware
